page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I woke up at half past seven. I get dressed Then I feed my hamster next I have a wash , clean my teeth and then I put my shoes on. I go downstairs and have frosties and toast. My mum makes my sandwiches and I go to school. When I get to school we go to assembly. After assembly we do Peak Maths, 36O and a poster. Then we have playtime, after playtime we do some more work. Then we have dinner, when we have finished we do more work. until playtime. We then and have a story, and finally we go home. I watch TV and do my topic. Mum makes the tea and I have a shower. I watch TV again and go to bed and have a read. Then I go to sleep. Goodnight. By Emma Peel. .
